description: This file is an HTML webpage serving as the user interface for a database visualizer application. It includes embedded CSS styles and JavaScript code to load, display, and interact with database information such as databases, tables, and data entries.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets current selections, and updates the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for the selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data for a specific table and renders it into the main content area.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates an HTML table from data array and inserts into the container.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Dynamically creates HTML for table cells based on the value type and size.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full data when truncated.
